name: SMS Translation Demo App
description: Example using Google Cloud Translation API to translate SMS messages.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: The client_email property from your google_creds.json file.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private_key property from your google_creds.json file. Make sure to copy and paste everything here.

GOOGLE_PROJECT_ID.description: The project_id property from your google_creds.json file. Make sure to copy and paste everything here.

REACT_APP_PHONE_NUMBER.description: The Nexmo phone number to display on the screen.

REACT_APP_COUNTRY_CODE.description: The Nexmo phone number country code for proper formatting.
